TopicTitle: HG-5 High Gain Antenna not working with custom tech tree

Articles.Content:
I have been working on a tech tree for myself using OpenTree. I am really liking it except for the fact that one part, the HG-5 High Gain Antenna is appearing in the wrong tech tree, even if the entry is removed in the TechTree.cfg.

The only entry for the HG-5 High Gain Antenna is this:
  

// - HG-5 High Gain Antenna
@PART[HighGainAntenna5]:LAST[OpenTree] {
    @TechRequired = scienceElectricityI
}

But even if I remove the entry above, the HG-5 High Gain Antenna will keep appearing in the wrong tech tree.

Any ideas on how to fix this? I have entries for each part in my TechTree.cfg and they all work except for this one part!
It needed to be 'HighGainAntenna5_v2' and that fixed it.
